alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Harrison and east central Hancock Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Lyman, or 11 miles northeast of Diamondhead. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Lyman, Saucier, Kiln and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 15 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
